*** Sat, 3 Sep 2016 22:24:41 ***
TEST FOR GRANGER-CAUSALITY:
H0: "realgdp" do not Granger-cause "realcons, realinv"

Test statistic l = 3.7090
pval-F( l; 8, 558) = 0.0003 

TEST FOR INSTANTANEOUS CAUSALITY:
H0: No instantaneous causality between "realgdp" and "realcons, realinv"

Test statistic: c = 86.2439
pval-Chi( c; 2) = 0.0000
